name: Ode to Resilience
description:
Hello my dearest Ludum Dare colleagues, this is what you need to know to play Ode to resilience (Also known as Ode to spaghettilios):

Controls:

A-D/arrows: movement

space bar: jump

How to play: (platformer)

Reach the end of the "poem" (about 4min)

The floor is made out of words, but pay attention to their meaning, for they might get literal (fire burns lol).

Note: An IA didn't write the ode, otherwise it would be less of a madness.

Thanks for playing!
